    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RealAndroidDevice.ErrorParsingReceiver
      Implementation of IShellOutputReceiver with helper functions to parse output lines and figure out if a call to IDevice.executeShellCommand(String, com.android.ddmlib.IShellOutputReceiver) succeeded.

    • Method Detail

      • chunkArgs

        public static com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<String>> chunkArgs(Iterable<String> args,
                                                                                                                 int sizeLimit)
        Breaks a list of strings into groups whose total size is within some limit. Kind of like the xargs command that groups arguments to avoid maximum argument length limits. Except that the limit in adb is about 1k instead of 512k or 2M on Linux.

      • parsePathAndPackageInfo

        public static Optional<PackageInfo> parsePathAndPackageInfo(String packageName,
                                                            String rawOutput)

      • deviceStartActivity

        @Nullable
public String deviceStartActivity(String activityToRun,
                                            boolean waitForDebugger)

      • uninstallApkFromDevice

        public boolean uninstallApkFromDevice(String packageName,
                                      boolean keepData)
        Uninstalls apk from specific device. Reports success or failure to console. It's currently here because it's used both by InstallCommand and UninstallCommand.
